entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Broadview
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:14 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -19.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Broadview 2:00 PM CST Monday 30 January 2023
Temperature: -19.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 61 %
Wind Chill: -29
Dewpoint: -25.2°C
Wind: WSW 16 km/h gust 27 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 36 this morning and minus 30 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 19. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness then 60 percent chance of light snow late in the morning and early afternoon. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 26 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023
